page.title: 01Queens Drive
page.content: This is a very central area of Stronsay and includes many special features, such the old mill. It used to make oats and bere. The mill used to run on water but is now sadly closed because none of the farmers make these produce any more. Another feature of this area is the shores which have creamy clean sand and varieties of underwater creatures. We also have shop,church, post office, a community center which is also used for dances etc and a burial ground. The community is mainly farming and fishing.
